summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Mercer Street from Dexter Avenue to Westlake Avenue et al, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 13076, creating Local Improvement District No. 1183 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
